alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 18 at 2:09PM CDT until March 19 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. * WHERE...Marion, Lamar and Forrest Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from 5 AM to 9 AM CDT Sunday. For the second Freeze Warning, from 8 PM Sunday to 10 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
